meanings.sent1: The bimolecular reaction required two small molecules to combine.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the bimolecular interaction between two specific molecules.
meanings.sent3: The bimolecular dance of the molecules was quite a sight under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The bimolecular bond between the molecules was as strong as a double knot.
meanings.sent5: The bimolecular process was like a delicate waltz between two molecules.

meanings.definition: Relating to a reaction involving two molecules.
meanings.sent1: The bimolecular pathway was crucial for the reaction to occur.
meanings.sent2: Chemists observed the bimolecular collision between two molecules.
meanings.sent3: The bimolecular party of molecules was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The bimolecular relationship between the molecules was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The bimolecular event was a synchronized meeting of two molecules.
